name: changemappers
description: Changemakers want to solve big social problems. Changemappers help them find & support each other and long-lasting impactful systemic change.

scripts.preinstall: cd changemappers-backend && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.postinstall: cd changemappers-frontend && npm i && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd changemappers-frontend && npm i && npm run build
